procedure-definition.comment: The select course must match these criteria: 1) Course.masterType = 'Class' 2) Course associated with current school district context 3) If the alias [DOE EXCLUDE CRS] is defined, include only course where Course.[DOE EXCLUDE CRS] no equals '1'; 4) If the input parameter requireSced is true, the field Course.[DOE SCED CODE] must not be empty. 5) If input query is other than all, input criteria is applied.

import-definition.name: MD PARCC/MCAP Test Scores Import
import-definition.comment:
The MD PARCC/MCAP Test Scores Import is used to import data into Student Assessments. The requirements for the Assessment Definition are:
1) must contain a column for Assessment Year with the alias "PARCCTSTYEAR"
2) must contain a column for Assessment Period with the alias "PARCCTSTPERIOD"
3) must contain a column for Assessment Test Code with the alias "PARCCTSTCODE"
The input file must be a CSV file with headers. The header values are used to map fields in the input file to columns in the Student Assessment or columns in the Assessment Definition. Some of these mappings are defined as hidden fields in the input definition. These headings are all required in the input file.
Heading "SASID" maps to student column "stdIDState"
Heading "ASSESSMENT_YEAR" maps to field with the alias "PARCCTSTYEAR"
Heading "PERIOD" maps to field with the alias "PARCCTSTPERIOD"
Heading "TEST_CODE" maps to field with the alias "PARCCTSTCODE"
Heading "ONLINE_UNIT1_TEST_START_DT" maps to student assessment column "asmDate"
Heading "SCHOOL" maps to school column with alias "DOE SCHOOL CODE"
Heading "SCALE_SCORE" maps to student assessment column with alias "PARCC_SCALE_SCORE"
Heading "PARCC_PERFORMANCE_LEVEL" maps to student assessment column with alias "PARCC_PARCC_PERFORMANCE_LEVEL"
